title: Sweet potato pie with marshmallow topping
ingredients: ['200g digestive biscuits, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '120g butter, melted', '225g cream cheese, softened', '400g cooked and mashed sweet potatoes', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar', '60ml single cream', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla essence', '200g miniature marshmallows']
